title: Dreading
content: Everyone's going for garba, going out with friends on trips, and having fun outside and I'm stuck with this shit 6:30pm curfew. Parents don't get me back home on weekends or holidays, every holiday goes in this place, they don't let me go overnight to friends or relatives here either, same monotonous life forcing myself to come back by 6:30 to hostel, sigh
